questions.question: What is the main goal of penetration testing?
options: To assess the effectiveness of security controls
To monitor network traffic for suspicious activity
questions.solution: To assess the effectiveness of security controls

questions.question: Which type of malware is designed to block access to a computer system until a sum of money is paid?
What is the purpose of the Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) in networking?
options: To translate domain names to IP addresses
To map IP addresses to MAC addresses
To establish a connection between devices on a network
questions.solution: To map IP addresses to MAC addresses

questions.question: In the context of networking, what advantage does subnetting offer in terms of network management?
options: Subnetting allows for the efficient allocation of IP addresses and reduces network congestion.
Subnetting ensures that all devices on the same network segment have identical configurations.
Subnetting enables the use of multicast communication for broadcasting messages to multiple hosts.
Subnetting improves network security by isolating different departments within an organization.
questions.solution: Subnetting allows for the efficient allocation of IP addresses and reduces network congestion.

questions.question: Which type of network attack involves flooding a network or server with excessive requests to disrupt its normal operation?
Which security measure is essential for protecting against phishing attacks?
In which type of learning does the model learn from its mistakes and update its parameters accordingly?
In the context of machine learning, what is the primary objective of feature scaling?
options: To reduce the dimensionality of the dataset
To standardize the range of features to a similar scale
To introduce additional features for better model performance
To randomly shuffle the order of feature vectors
questions.solution: To standardize the range of features to a similar scale

questions.question: In the context of a binary tree, what is the height of a tree with n nodes?
Which sorting algorithm is not stable?
Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of NoSQL databases?
Which of the following is not a property of a transaction in a DBMS?

A company wants to deploy a web application that can handle sudden spikes in user traffic efficiently without incurring high infrastructure costs. Which cloud computing service would be most suitable for this requirement?
What is the purpose of auto-scaling in cloud computing?
options: To automatically adjust the size of virtual machines based on demand
To automatically deploy new instances of an application
To automatically encrypt data stored in the cloud
questions.solution: To automatically adjust the size of virtual machines based on demand

questions.question: What is the purpose of digital twins in IoT?
options: To create virtual replicas of physical devices for testing purposes
To simulate real-world scenarios and predict outcomes
To optimize resource utilization and minimize downtime
To enable remote monitoring and control of physical assets
questions.solution: To create virtual replicas of physical devices for testing purposes

questions.question: Which of the following scenarios best demonstrates the application of edge computing in IoT?
options: Analysing sensor data in real-time at the device level to make immediate adjustments.
Storing all IoT data in a centralized cloud server for long-term analysis.
Utilizing a peer-to-peer network for communication between IoT devices.
Implementing blockchain technology to secure IoT data transactions.
questions.solution: Analysing sensor data in real-time at the device level to make immediate adjustments.

questions.question: Which recent development in computer vision has enabled machines to understand and interpret visual information more effectively?
Which of the following best describes the purpose of the CPU cache?
options: To store frequently accessed instructions and data for faster processing
To store the operating system files permanently
To provide additional storage space for secondary storage devices
To facilitate communication between the CPU and RAM
questions.solution: To store frequently accessed instructions and data for faster processing

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of parallelism commonly found in modern CPUs?
Which software development methodology emphasizes the importance of self-organizing cross-functional teams and frequent customer collaboration?
